messageBody:
On 12/13/05, godhs_g <godhs_g@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I need to automate unit testing using JUNIT for my application.
> I am new to junit. I learnt that many of you are using junit in your
> projects. Could someone throw light on how to start with
> the automation part (testing framework or testcase generation tools
> etc...).

Absolutely the first thing to do is make sure that your unit tests are
excellent. Without good tests, you're just automating unhelpful tests.
There are now a number of good JUnit books available.

The second thing to do is to select a build tool like Ant or Maven and
learn to use it to drive your tests. I recommend Ant, personaly, but
there are plenty of folks who like Maven.

> Thanks in advance,
> godhs

You're welcome.
